title: The Adventures Of Bubbles And Her Friends In The Underwater City Episode 1: A Strange New World
description: Can you possibly imagine moving to the most fantastic underwater city ever created? If you decide to go too, you will have to leave all of your friends behind. Don't worry though, because there will be plenty of time to make new BFF's once you arrive.Okay, finish packing now if you dare. Take a jet airplane to Hawaii and then jump on a helicopter and travel one hundred miles south to a very small landing platform in the middle of nowhere. Climb down the platform and enter the Penguin Shuttle submarine for the final trip to Oceana. Madison, Winter, Owen, Evan, Alison, Ryan, Conner and Hailey are already on their way.
author: T.J. Renner
